original_text:
What shall I say? For he has spoken to me,
    and he himself has done it.
I walk slowly all my years
    because of the bitterness of my soul.
korean_text: 주께서 내게 말씀하시고 또 친히 이루셨사오니 내가 무슨 말씀을 하오리이까 내 영혼의 고통으로 말미암아 내가 종신토록 방황하리이다

sentences.original_text: For he has spoken to me,
and he himself has done it.
I walk slowly all my years
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나의 모든 해에 더디 걷나니

sentences.original_text: because of the bitterness of my soul.
